Donations

The Family Advocacy Clinic at Voice and Vision, Inc., depends on your donations to operate. Please consider making a financial gift today. All donations are dedicated entirely to helping Families and are tax deductible.

Please contact Michael J. Harper, Director of Advocacy with any questions at michaelh@voiceandvisioninc.org.

NOTE: We use PayPal for donations, but you do NOT need an account. After you click the donate button above, look for text that says “Don’t have a PayPal account?” near the bottom. Click on the linked word “continue” to proceed and pay by credit card without creating an account.
